You have investors and others saying` Gosh, Facebook seems to be doing so well. Why aren't you the hot new thing?' Danny Sullivan said. . Meanwhile, Lee's colleague, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand Gillbrand made a stop in Rochester Friday afternoon. She did not have much to say on Lee's actions, but rather on the voters in the district. My focus is on the constituents in teh district, and my goal is that they are all well looked after and have access to all the constituent services they need during this time of transition, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ,( D) New York. Kirsten Gillibrand did work closely with Lee to craft legislation for the families of Flight 3407 victims. She says that work will continue without the congressman. The irony is that when he steps down as CEO, Eric Schmidt will concentrate on communication with the outside world. As Executive Chairman, I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach; and internally as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin , he said in a target="_blank" blog post.
